entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
